title: AI Job Boom: Analyzing the Concentration of Opportunities in Indian Cities
description: Artificial Intelligence job opportunities are predominantly concentrated in Bengaluru, Delhi-NCR, and Mumbai, with these cities accounting for nearly 70% of AI-related job openings on Naukri.com. This reflects a shift in India's economic role in the global digital landscape, driven by growing demand in engineering, data science, and customer success sectors.
content: As the demand for Artificial Intelligence (AI) expertise surges, a concentrated hiring trend has emerged within India's major cities. A recent report by property consultant CBRE reveals that Bengaluru, Delhi-NCR, and Mumbai collectively account for n... [897 chars]

title: Why AI data centres might push the PlayStation 6 launch to 2029
description: A sharp rise in demand for memory chips, driven largely by artificial intelligence, has left console makers facing higher costs and tighter supply.
content: Consequently, semiconductor manufacturers are now concentrating on the production of memory for AI servers rather than consumer electronics. This has resulted in a reduced supply of chips for the production of gaming consoles, laptops, and smartphone... [1064 chars]

title: When an apology sounds too perfect: A New Zealand judge questions AI-written remorse
description: In a Christchurch courtroom, neatly phrased apology letters prompted a judge to ask whether remorse drafted by artificial intelligence can ever feel real.
content: It was the polish that gave it away. In the District Court in Christchurch, a woman who had pleaded guilty to arson submitted apology letters to her victims and to the court. They were articulate, balanced, and emotionally precise. Judge Tom Gilbert ... [3111 chars]

description: Voice will emerge as the dominant interface for artificial intelligence, ElevenLabs co-founder and CEO Mati Staniszewski has said.
content:

title: India AI Impact Summit Expo extended by a day, event to continue till February 21 amid huge response

content:
